themes: Retention of talent in cultural organizations
Equity for smaller and historically underfunded organizations
key_phrases: Offer general operating support—not just project-based grants
organizations can plan long-term, retain talent, and remain responsive
Simplify grant applications, reporting requirements, and eligibility criteria
particularly for smaller and historically underfunded organizations
Consider language access and technical support
barriers_identified: Complex grant applications and reporting requirements
Insufficient support for smaller and historically underfunded organizations
solutions_proposed: Simplify grant applications, reporting requirements, and eligibility criteria
Provide language access and technical support
